SELECT seller.company_name AS buyer_company_name , seller.business_no AS buyer_biz_no , seller.memb_no AS buyer_memb_no , dfrd.group_type AS group_type , TO_CHAR(dfrd.issue_date::DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS issue_date , TO_CHAR(dfrd.expiration_date::DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS expiration_date , (CASE WHEN LENGTH(dfrd.payment_date) < 8 THEN '-' ELSE TO_CHAR(dfrd.payment_date::DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') END) AS payment_date , dfrd.amount AS amount , dfrd.transaction_no AS transaction_no , dfrd.taxbill_no AS taxbill_no , dfrd.send_status AS send_status , sales.expiration_avg AS expiration_avg FROM tb_dfrd_acnts_rcvble AS dfrd JOIN tb_sales_monthly_data AS sales ON dfrd.buyer_biz_no = sales.buyer_biz_no AND dfrd.seller_biz_no = sales.seller_biz_no JOIN tb_memb_info AS seller ON sales.buyer_biz_no = seller.business_no
ORDER BY dfrd.issue_date LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstRecordIndex}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_dfrd_acnts_rcvble AS dfrd JOIN tb_sales_monthly_data AS sales ON dfrd.buyer_biz_no = sales.buyer_biz_no AND dfrd.seller_biz_no = sales.seller_biz_no JOIN tb_memb_info AS seller ON sales.buyer_biz_no = seller.business_no

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(dfrd.amount, 0)), 0) FROM tb_dfrd_acnts_rcvble AS dfrd JOIN tb_sales_monthly_data AS sales ON dfrd.buyer_biz_no = sales.buyer_biz_no AND dfrd.seller_biz_no = sales.seller_biz_no JOIN tb_memb_info AS seller ON sales.buyer_biz_no = seller.business_no
